nodes.text: William Haden Blackman is a writer who has long worked in the Star Wars universe. He was also the project lead on the MMO Star Wars Galaxies and the video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. He resigned from his position at LucasArts on July 29, 2010. On December 4, 2014, he founded his own studio Hangar 13, as a division of 2K Games.[source?]
